item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 全球降息推动比特币迎来历史上最好的一个九月
item.description: 在以美国积极转向宽松货币政策为首的全球降息浪潮的推动下，比特币有望在九月份取得有史以来最大的涨幅之一。【原文：Bitcoin is on course for one of its biggest September gains ever, courtesy of a global wave of interest-rate cuts headlined by an aggressive pivot to looser monetary policy in the US.】

item.title: 市场突然重新信任中国，但仅限于一点
item.description:
政治局的经济计划对投资者来说具有可喜的影响。证据将体现在消费者身上。【原文：

The Politburo’s economic plans have a welcome impact for investors. The proof will be in what gets achieved with consumers.

】

item.title: 汽车安全丑闻和美国召回导致丰田汽车产量下降
item.description: 丰田汽车公司的销售额再次下滑，此前日本和中国市场的下滑结束了短暂的复苏，而国内丑闻和国外召回又扰乱了生产。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s sales fell again after declines in Japan and China put an end to a short-lived recovery, while production was disrupted by domestic scandals and recalls abroad.】

item.title: 基金经理将能源转型视为千载难逢的机遇
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，Foresight Group的伯纳德-费尔曼（Bernard Fairman ）讨论了向清洁能源发展的趋势，他认为这是一个有利可图的投资主题，将在30到50年内发挥作用。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Foresight Group’s Bernard Fairman discusses the movement toward cleaner energy, a lucrative investment theme he sees playing out over 30 to 50 years.

】

item.title: 石油熊市创纪录，显示市场日益由阿尔戈斯石油公司主导
item.description: 在过去的几周里，投机者们前所未有地对油价下注。【原文：For the last few weeks, speculators have been wagering against oil prices like never before.】

item.title: 加纳有望因通胀放缓而下调关键利率
item.description: 在西非国家通胀速度放缓并有望进一步降温之后，加纳有望在八个月内首次降低利率。【原文：Ghana is expected to lower interest rates for the first time in eight months after the pace of inflation slowed in the West African nation and is expected to cool further.】

item.title: 保罗-陶布曼（Paul Taubman）的 PJT 公司在 deNovo 交易后着眼于沙特阿拉伯的增长
item.description: 华尔街咨询公司 PJT Partners 创始人保罗-陶布曼（Paul Taubman）在接受彭博电视采访时表示，在收购总部位于迪拜的 deNovo Partners 之后，该公司计划增加在沙特阿拉伯的员工人数。【原文：Wall Street advisory firm PJT Partners plans to increase its headcount in Saudi Arabia following the acquisition of Dubai-based deNovo Partners, founder Paul Taubman told Bloomberg TV in an interview.】

item.title: 瑞士央行拒绝干预，瑞士法郎逼近十年高点
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The Swiss franc may reach the strongest level in almost a decade as the nation’s central bank cuts interest rates more gradually than peers and refrains from intervening to weaken the currency, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of New York Mellon.】

item.title: 据说 Medco Energi 正在洽谈收购 Senoko 的控股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，PT Medco Energi Internasional 公司正在就收购 Senoko Energy Pte. 公司的控股权进行排他性谈判，这笔交易对这家总部位于新加坡的电力公司的估值可能高达 10 亿美元。【原文：PT Medco Energi Internasional is in exclusive talks to buy a controlling stake in Senoko Energy Pte., according to people with knowledge of the matter, in a deal that could value the Singapore-based power firm at as much as $1 billion.】

item.title: 中国股市狂热，故障和延误频发
item.description: 中国期待已久的刺激措施可能令市场难以承受。【原文：China’s long-awaited stimulus measures may have been too much for the markets to handle.】

item.title: 彼得-泰尔今年已售出 10 亿美元 Palantir 股票
item.description: 彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）本周抛售了近 6 亿美元的 Palantir 科技公司股票，使他今年的抛售总额超过了 10 亿美元。【原文：Peter Thiel sold almost $600 million of Palantir Technologies Inc. stock this week, bringing his total disposals this year to more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 财政刺激计划给中国债券带来债务供应风险
item.description: 有关中国利用特别主权债务为新的刺激措施提供资金的一系列消息凸显了其创纪录的债券涨势面临的一个日益增长的风险：新的供应激增。【原文：A flurry of news on China’s use of special sovereign debt to fund fresh stimulus highlights a growing risk to its record bond rally — a surge in new supply.】

item.title: 印度股市有望在 2024 年强劲收尾
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 英特尔询问收购产品部门事宜后，Arm 遭英特尔回绝
item.description: 据一位直接知情人士透露，Arm Holdings Plc 曾与英特尔公司接洽，希望收购这家濒临破产的芯片制造商的产品部门，但却被告知该业务不出售。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc approached Intel Corp. about potentially buying the ailing chipmaker’s product division, only to be told that the business isn’t for sale, according to a person with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 交易商认为高市在自民党投票中胜算上升，日元下跌
item.description: 由于交易商猜测经济安全大臣佐那江隆一成为日本下一任领导人的可能性正在增加，日元兑美元下跌，日本债券期货上涨。【原文：The yen declined against the dollar and Japanese bond futures rose as traders speculated the chances are increasing that economic security minister Sanae Takaichi will be Japan’s next leader.】

item.title: 财政刺激政策吸引更多买家，中国股市攀升
item.description: 中国股市的涨势进一步扩大，因为有关财政刺激措施的讨论使早期对政府支持持怀疑态度的人变成了支持者。【原文：Chinese stocks’ rally stretched further, as talks of a fiscal stimulus boost turned early skeptics of the government’s support into believers.】

item.title: 新世界汽车陨落，230 亿美元王朝接班人岌岌可危
item.description: K11 Musea 被誉为 "文化硅谷"，即使按照香港豪宅的标准来看，它的奢华程度也毫不逊色。【原文：Even by the standards of big-money Hong Kong, K11 Musea, a glittering marvel dubbed the “Silicon Valley of Culture,” stands apart for its lavishness.】

item.title: 中国誓言提振铁矿石前景，铁矿石反弹至 100 美元上方
item.description: 铁矿石创下 4 月份以来的最大单周涨幅，期货价格突破每吨 100 美元，此前中国的政策制定者推出了一系列举措，以支持全球最大的炼钢原料用户的增长。【原文：Iron ore headed for the biggest weekly gain since April — with futures topping $100 a ton — after policymakers in China unveiled a blitz of initiatives to support growth in the world’s largest user of the steel-making ingredient.】

item.title: 查默斯称中国经济刺激政策可能会促进澳大利亚经济发展
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）在为期两天的访问中与北京的同行会晤后，称赞中国新的经济刺激措施对澳大利亚和全球经济来说都是 "真正值得欢迎的发展"。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers hailed China’s new stimulus effort as a “really welcome development” for both his nation and the global economy after meetings with counterparts in Beijing during a two-day visit.】

item.title: 三菱收购马来西亚液化天然气厂股份以扩大投资组合
item.description: 根据与国有能源公司马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas）达成的协议，三菱公司将购买马来西亚一家天然气液化厂的股份。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. will buy stake in a Malaysian natural gas liquefaction plant in an agreement with state-owned energy firm Petronas.】

item.title: 明星公司损失惨重，市值几乎缩水一半
item.description: 星际娱乐集团有限公司（Star Entertainment Group Ltd.）的股票在复牌后暴跌达 44%，此前该公司发布了一份期待已久且令人难堪的最新财务报告，显示这家不盈利的赌场运营商需要更多资金，而且经营状况正在恶化。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. stock tumbled as much as 44% as it resumed trading after a long-awaited and confronting financial update showed the unprofitable casino operator needs even more capital and trading conditions are deteriorating.】

item.title: 日经 225 指数将从 7 月加息后的下跌中恢复过来
item.description: 日本日经 225 平均指数（Nikkei 225 Stock Average）从 7 月底日本央行决定加息引发的暴跌中全面回升。【原文：Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average headed for a full recovery from a rout set off by the Bank of Japan’s decision to raise interest rates at the end of July.】

item.title: 高盛认为盈利修正将进一步提振日本股市
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Momentum for corporate earnings remains solid despite gains in the yen and bodes well for Japanese stocks to rise further this year, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。股市继续走高，这次是在中国刺激计划出台之后。花旗和阿波罗联手推出私人信贷。现金不断涌入货币市场基金。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Stocks keep going higher — this time in the wake of China stimulus plans. Citi and Apollo are teaming up on private credit. And cash just keeps flooding into money market funds. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 供应量有望大幅增加，石油周线深跌
item.description: 由于欧佩克（OPEC）成员国沙特阿拉伯和利比亚可能会增加供应，石油价格延续了连续两天的大幅下跌，使其有望出现连续一周的大幅下跌。【原文：Oil extended a sharp two-day drop, putting prices on course for a substantial weekly decline, on prospects of more supply from OPEC members Saudi Arabia and Libya.】

item.title: 兼职 "董事是日本公司董事会面临的问题
item.description: 随着东京证券交易所（Tokyo Stock Exchange）加大改善公司治理的压力，董事身兼多个董事会成员的日本公司正面临股票市场的不满。【原文：Japanese companies with directors that sit on multiple boards are facing the equity market’s displeasure as the Tokyo Stock Exchange steps up pressure to improve corporate governance.】

item.title: 新加坡交易所内部人士对股市复苏表示怀疑
item.description: 新加坡已开始大力重振其凋敝的股市。在其交易所运营商内部和市场参与者中间，对重启能否成功存在着深深的悲观情绪。【原文：Singapore has kicked off a big effort to revive its withering stock market. Inside its exchange operator and among market participants, there is deep pessimism that the reboot will succeed.】

item.title: 流行超市玩具助推中国消费亮点上涨 150
item.description: 对 34 岁的上海居民李美琪（Miki Li）和她的家人来说，到公寓附近的大众超市（Pop Mart）看看最新的商品已经成了周末的例行公事。【原文：Checking out the latest arrivals in a Pop Mart store near their apartment has become a weekend routine for 34-year-old Shanghai resident Miki Li and her family.】

item.title: 莫迪吸引芯片制造商，东京电子准备拓展印度市场
item.description: 东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）寻求在印度建立一支芯片工程师团队，以更好地顺应莫迪政府在世界人口最多的国家推动更多半导体制造的政策。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. seeks to build a team of chip engineers in India to better ride the Modi government’s push for more semiconductor manufacturing in the world’s most populous country.】
